duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement SAP Concur services and Service Administration procurement.
Hands-on service configuration and client project team training.
Client testing/validation support and service administration delivery.
Manage multiple complex, multi-phased implementations following SAP Concur methodology.
Gather client's business requirements and configure SAP Concur services.
Manage client expectations, drive deliverables, and exercise scope control.
Design solutions for complex requirements and maintain strong functional and technical product knowledge.
Work with Concur support and internal project teams, and communicate and persuade clients to adopt recommended solutions.
Conduct effective training and product demonstrations, and provide consultative expertise to stakeholders.
Contribute to SAP Concur project methodology and document library.
Configure SAP Concur SaaS solution, including screens, administration, interfaces/connector, and reporting.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or Business Administration (MBA preferred)
